circadipy

Installation

The installation process for the package is pretty straightforward. You can install it using pip.

You can follow these steps:

  1. Make sure that the environment you created in the previous section is activated (the terminal should look like this):

    (circadipy_env) $

    • If it is not activated, you can activate it using the following command:

    (base) $ mamba activate circadipy_env

  2. Then you can install the package using pip:

    (circadipy_env) $ pip install circadipy

  3. Wait for the installation to finish.

(circadipy_env) $ pip install circadipy
